description:
A group of Allied Shinobi, including Omoi and Maki of the Sand, battle against several reanimated enemies. Maki recognizes one of them as Pakura, her former master who was a Sand Village hero.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`utilisatrice de Shakuton ! Pakura du village caché du Sable
User of the Scorch Style: Pakura of the Sand!
灼遁使い! 砂隠れのパクラ
